publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1236 Irene Oldfather: Europe Day - 9 May 2004-That the Parliament is proud to mark Europe Day as a celebration of the founding of the European Union (EU); endorses the fundamental principles of the EU as set out in the declaration by Robert Schumann on 9 May 1950; welcomes the contribution that the EU has made towards peace and solidarity across Europe; agrees that enlargement on 1 May 2004 represents a historic moment in our European history; acknowledges that the principles on which the EU was originally founded are now more important than ever; extends the hand of friendship to the 10 accession states, and encourages the people of Scotland to join the citizens of Europe in the celebration of our common values on Europe Day.

S2M-1236 Irene Oldfather: Europe Day - 9 May 2004-That the Parliament is proud to mark Europe Day as a celebration of the founding of the European Union (EU); endorses the fundamental principles of the EU as set out in the declaration by Robert Schumann on 9 May 1950; welcomes the contribution that the EU has made towards peace and solidarity across Europe; agrees that enlargement on 1 May 2004 represents a historic moment in our European history; acknowledges that the principles on which the EU was originally founded are now more important than ever; extends the hand of friendship to the 10 accession states, and encourages the people of Scotland to join the citizens of Europe in the celebration of our common values on Europe Day.
S2M-1236 Europe Day - 9 May 2004 (lodged on 29 April 2004) Mike Pringle*
S2M-1236 Europe Day - 9 May 2004 (lodged on 29 April 2004) Maureen Macmillan*
S2M-1236 Europe Day - 9 May 2004 (lodged on 29 April 2004) Donald Gorrie*
S2M-1236 Europe Day - 9 May 2004 (lodged on 29 April 2004) Robert Brown*
